We’re taking extra care to keep our staff and customers safe in these challenging times. Taking extra care means taking extra time, and this is affecting our service and delivery. Please bear with us – our customer service team will get back to you soon, and we are aiming to deliver your order within 10 working days.
If you have any queries about a delayed order, please contact us on: 0861 466 324 (South Africa) or +27 21 680 1300 (outside South Africa)
SAFE & HYGIENIC DELIVERIES
Our drivers will be
fully equipped with
hygiene kits including
gloves and masks,
and they will ensure
you experience
a no-contact
delivery process.
This means that:
Our drivers will be fully equipped with hygiene kits including gloves and masks, and they will ensure you experience a no-contact delivery process.
This means that:
All our drivers have
been instructed to
place your delivery on
your doorstep, ring
your doorbell and
then stand back at a
safe distance until
you answer the door.
All our drivers have been instructed to place your delivery on your doorstep, ring your doorbell and then stand back at a safe distance until you answer the door.
Our drivers will then
record the date, your
name, ID number and
the time of delivery,
and you won’t have to
sign anything.
Our drivers will then record the date, your name, ID number and the time of delivery, and you won’t have to sign anything.
Please disinfect all packaging and products before use. Follow the manufacturer’s instructions with regard to cleaning. If there are no cleaning instructions included, then wash/wipe soft surfaces with fabric detergent and water and wipe hard surfaces with 70% alcohol spray. Dry surfaces thoroughly before use.
Please disinfect all packaging and products before use. Follow the manufacturer’s instructions with regard to cleaning. If there are no cleaning instructions included, then wash/wipe soft surfaces with fabric detergent and water and wipe hard surfaces with 70% alcohol spray. Dry surfaces thoroughly before use.
If you are receiving furniture, the courier will call you to book the delivery. The product will be delivered to your door and for your safety, the couriers will not enter your home. Please ensure you are able to manage your delivery from the entrance of your home.
COLLECTION OF ORDERS
We have implemented extra hygiene controls at all our Choice Collect containers, Pargo counters and showrooms to ensure your safety. These include:
  • The daily screening of all our staff to ensure they are free of COVID-19 symptoms
  • Hand sanitiser will be available at entrances and receiving counters for your use
  • All devices and parcels will be sanitised before and after being handled
  • A contactless scanning option if you don’t feel comfortable signing for your parcel
  • All our staff will follow government prescribed safety procedures, including wearing masks, practising social distancing and regular sanitising of work areas.
RETURNS MADE EASY
Not happy with your order? Let us fix that. Our returns period is 14 days, and starting the process is as simple as sending an SMS. To log a return, please SMS ‘RETURN’ to 072 595 6743 and we’ll call you back, or contact one of our agents on 0861 466 324 (South Africa) or +27 21 680 1300 (outside South Africa).
Stay informed! Visit the SA Department of Health’s website for COVID-19 updates.
